name: Ghost File - The Haunted Game (demo)
description:
A haunted game ties with the disappearances of 7 children. Find the truth behind this case.

This is an adventure horror game where you collect information, build up your case file with evidence, reveal bit by bit the truth behind the haunted game and maybe  save the  missing children.

You collect information by chatting   with  people of interest through messenger, surfing the web and use your "Spirit Sight" to spot hidden stuffs that wandered into your laptop.

The game is currently in development. The download files contain the opening sequence that lead to the main gmae.
